short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds very realistic animated spiders to your chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every time you click the 'boo!' button, a spider will be added to the current page. There is a random delay to maximize the fright.  The animated spiders will walk around the screen. If your mouse overlaps the spider there is a chance of it dying and falling to the bottom of the screen.
